Kayla, ma ọ bụ Kayliñña (Ge'ez: ካይላ kāylā, maka ndị mmadụ, Ge'ez: Каይልኛ kāylññā, Kayla, Amharic, na Tigrinya maka asụsụ) bụ otu n'ime asụsụ Agaw abụọ nke otu ndị Beta Israel (Ethiopian Jews) na asụbu
A na-ejikwa aha Kayla mee ihe mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka okwu mkpuchi maka asụsụ abụọ Beta Israel
A maara ya naanị site na ihe edeturu na-ebipụtaghị nke Jacques Faitlovitch dere na mkpụrụedemede Ge'ez, nke David Appleyard mụrụ na nso nso a
Ọ bụ Beta Israel na-echekwa ya taa.
